title: Trump On Tape
description: Donald Trump's vulgar comments about women, and a look at GOP rules for replacing the candidate. This episode: host/White House correspondent Tamara Keith, campaign reporter Sam Sanders, congressional correspondent Susan Davis, and editor/correspondent Ron Elving, with lawyer and Republican party rules expert Ben Ginsberg. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
